title: Only Rich People
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Let’s tell stories that only happen to rich people~! Yaay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I’m not doing it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Eh, isn’t it fine. If it’s with Maki I can talk about stuff like this<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>There’s nothing special just because you have money okay? My pocket money is normal too….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Then, listen to Mari’s story!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I guess it can’t be helped…. Go on<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>The other day, I went to a Udon place with Chikacchi, You, and Hanamaru. After buying the ticket at the front entrance and eating, I asked for the bill. Then….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wait. I don’t want to hear this story. It reminded me of the time where I went to a ramen place with Rin and Hanayo….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Maki…. You too….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….Yeah. I thought the ticket that you bought at the entrance was an entry ticket. Because, it’s unthinkable how you can serve such delicious food at that kind of price!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
